title: 30 Days of Night (IDW)
description:
30 Days of Night was, initially, a three-issue miniseries that jump-started the careers of writer Steve Niles and artist Ben Templesmith. After the success of the mini-series a number of sequels followedand, in 2007, was adapted into a film of the same name.

The premise of the original mini-series was that a group of vampires flock to Barrow, Alaska where the sun sets for about 30 days, allowing them to feed without the burden of sleep to avoid lethal sunlight.

Pack includes:

30 Days Of Night 01-03
30 Days of Night 01 (5th Anniversary Edition)
30 Days Of Night GN
30 Days of Night Annual 01-02
30 Days of Night - Beyond Barrow 01-03
30 Days of Night - Bloodsucker Tales 01-08
30 Days of Night - Dead Space 01-03
30 Days of Night - Eben & Stella 01-03
30 Days of Night - Epilogue - Picking Up The Pieces
30 Days of Night - Prequel	
30 Days of Night - Red Snow 01-03
30 Days of Night - Return to Barrow 01-06
30 Days of Night - Spreading the Disease 01-05
30 Days of Night 2005 Calendar
30 Days of Night Sourcebook 
30 Days of Night the Movie Poster 
30 Days of Night TPB extras - Script	
Dark Days 01-06
Focus On... 30 Days of Night

A reading order is also included.



Released on http://ComicPirates.info
